name: graphql_graphql_query
description: Execute GraphQL queries using either a specified endpoint or the default endpoint configured during installation

endpoint.description: GraphQL endpoint URL (can be omitted to use default)

variables.description: Variables to use with the query (JSON object)

headers.description: Additional headers to include in the request (will be merged with default headers)

name: graphql_graphql_introspect
description: Introspect a GraphQL schema from an endpoint with configurable headers

endpoint.description: GraphQL endpoint URL (can be omitted to use default)

headers.description: Additional headers to include in the request (will be merged with default headers)
